channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [RAT-290] Dependency updates via dependabot
item.description:
Updates via dependabot

Update maven-plugin-annotations from 3.6.1 to 3.6.2

https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/26

Update commons-cli from 1.4 to 1.5.0

https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/27

Update plexus-utils from 3.0.21 to 3.4.1

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/23 v3.4.1

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/67 v3.4.2

Update maven-dependency-plugin from 3.1.1 to 3.2.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/24/ 3.1.1

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/56 3.2.0

Updated asf parent from 23 to 24/25/26

applied directly on master - 2022-02-22, 2022-04-14

Updated mockito-core from 3.11.2 to 4.6.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/35 - 4.2.0
via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/41 - 4.3.0
via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/53 - 4.4.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/61 - 4.5.1

directly applied in master branch - 4.6.0

Updated maven-site-plugin from 3.9.1 to 3.12.0

Applied directly in master branch - 3.10.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/48 - 3.11.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/60 - 3.12.0

Updated wagon-ssh from 3.5.0 to 3.5.1

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/37

Updated maven-compiler-plugin from 3.8.1 to 3.10.1

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/39 - 3.9.0
via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/52 - 3.10.0
via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/54 - 3.10.1

Updated mavenPluginPluginVersion from 3.6.2 to 3.6.4 - maven-plugin-annotation & maven-plugin-plugin

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/40

Updated maven-project-info-reports-plugin from 3.1.1 to 3.3.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/34 v3.1.2

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/45 v3.2.1

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/50 v3.2.2

via  https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/66 v3.3.0

Updated animal-sniffer-maven-plugin from 1.20 to 1.21

https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/44
Thanks to XenoAmess

Updated maven-javadoc-plugin from 3.3.1 to 3.4.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/46 - v3.3.2

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/64 - v3.4.0

Update maven-pmd-plugin from 3.14.0 to 3.16.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/32
via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/38
via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/47 -> extracted as version as property

Update actions/setup-java from 2.5.0 to 3.3.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/49 3.0.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/58 3.1.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/59 3.1.1

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/64 3.3.0

Update actions/checkout from 2 to 3

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/51

Update maven-antrun-plugin from 3.0.0 to 3.1.0

via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/63

Update maven-jxr-plugin from 2.5 to 3.2.0

Needed some changes as well (animal-sniffer configuration)
via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/21 - v3.1.1
via https://github.com/apache/creadur-rat/pull/55 - v3.2.0
=> no reports are generated at the moment

2022-03-27: Reported MNG-7442 while researching on jxr-plugin report issue.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

This reverts commit a558e0ea2f994f227e38e27b3738cdbfc74a7a78.

RAT-290: Fix javadoc error

Hi guys.
I can help you fix the animal sniffer upgrade thing.
But you must wait me for about 15 hours.
I will fix it when I get off work today.

XenoAmess thanks for reaching out - the update works with certain JDK combination but fails with some of the versions that are built via Travis. Feel free to start a PR via Github as it should trigger the Travis build. Thanks
